Those would be bell tents. We were still using them in the Girl Guides in the 70's.

This photo is an amazing treasure, few people realise the caribbean troops were in WW1

comment._content: how i wish to find some of my grandfather's old photo while he's still in service.. he served in vietnam in his time in 1945 or 46 i think... i hate war but i deeply respect those brave soldier who sacrifice their own lives for others...
